Episodes.Title: Piss & Shit
Episodes.Plot: When the guys have to pass a drug test at work, they only have one choice: bribe middle school kids for clean urine.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.Writer: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Kyle Newac

Episodes.Title: We Be Ballin'
Episodes.Plot: The guys will stop at nothing to get tickets to a sold-out basketball game, even if it means being dunked in a horchata tank and seeing a grown man's penis.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Office Campout
Episodes.Plot: The guys camp out at the office while their house is fumigated, but the giddiness of their drug-fueled slumber party turns into paranoia when they think the company is being burglarized.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Promotion
Episodes.Plot: The guys' loyalties to each other are put to the test when they compete for a rumored promotion at work.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Checkpoint Gnarly
Episodes.Plot: Things go badly when the guys hit a DUI checkpoint after drinking with the boss's brother.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Strike
Episodes.Plot: The guys go on strike for better benefits when Alice doesn't buy their observance of a phony holiday called Half-Christmas.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Straight Up Juggahos
Episodes.Plot: The guys try to keep Jillian from a business function by setting her up on a blind date, but their plan goes awry when she has to be rescued from an Insane Clown Posse concert.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: To Friend a Predator
Episodes.Plot: When the guys try "To Catch a Predator", a local child molester, he turns out to be the coolest guy they ever met.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Muscle I'd Like to Flex
Episodes.Plot: Blake and Anders' world turns upside down when they lose Adam to a super-rich MILF.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: In the Line of Getting Fired
Episodes.Plot: When the CEO of TelAmeriCorp arrives to liquidate the company, it's up to the guys to change his mind and save the day.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sexual references and offensive language
